com.nimbusds.openid.connect.messages
Class AuthorizationErrorResponse

java.lang.Object
  com.nimbusds.openid.connect.messages.AuthorizationErrorResponse
All Implemented Interfaces:
ErrorResponse, Message, Response
public class AuthorizationErrorResponse
extends java.lang.Object
implements ErrorResponse

Authorisation error response.

Legal error codes:

  • OAuth 2.0 errors:
    • ErrorCode.INVALID_REQUEST
    • ErrorCode.UNAUTHORIZED_CLIENT
    • ErrorCode.ACCESS_DENIED
    • ErrorCode.UNSUPPORTED_RESPONSE_TYPE
    • ErrorCode.INVALID_SCOPE
    • ErrorCode.SERVER_ERROR
    • ErrorCode.TEMPORARILY_UNAVAILABLE
    • ErrorCode.INVALID_REDIRECT_URI
  • OpenID Connect specific errors:
    • ErrorCode.INTERACTION_REQUIRED
    • ErrorCode.LOGIN_REQUIRED
    • ErrorCode.SESSION_SELECTION_REQUIRED
    • ErrorCode.CONSENT_REQUIRED
    • ErrorCode.INVALID_REQUEST_URI
    • ErrorCode.INVALID_OPENID_REQUEST_OBJECT

Example HTTP response: 

 HTTP/1.1 302 Found
 Location: https://client.example.com/cb?
 error=invalid_request
 &error_description=the%20request%20is%20not%20valid%20or%20malformed
 &state=af0ifjsldkj

Version:
0.9 (2012-05-03)
Author:
Vladimir Dzhuvinov

Constructor Detail

AuthorizationErrorResponse

public AuthorizationErrorResponse(java.net.URL redirectURI,
                                  ErrorCode errorCode,
                                  java.net.URL errorURI,
                                  ResponseTypeSet responseTypeSet,
                                  State state)
Creates a new authorisation error response.

Parameters:
redirectURI - The redirect URI. Must not be null.
errorCode - The error code. Must match one of the legal error codes for an authorisation error response and must not be null.
errorURI - Optional URI of a web page that includes information about the error, null if not specified.
responseTypeSet - The response type set, used to determine redirect URL composition. If unknown null.
state - The state parameter to be echoed back to the client, null if not specified.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the specified error code is not legal for an authorisation error response.

parse

public static AuthorizationErrorResponse parse(java.net.URL url)
                                        throws ParseException
Parses an authorisation error response.

Parameters:
url - The redirect URL to parse. Must not be null.
Throws:
ParseException - If the redirect URL cannot be parsed to a valid authorisation error response.
